name: Jerry Seinfeld
blurb: A stand-up comedian and the central character of the show. Obsessed with cleanliness, cereal, and dating.

name: George Costanza
blurb: Jerry's neurotic best friend. Often unemployed, insecure, and full of bad ideas.

name: Elaine Benes
blurb: Jerry's ex-girlfriend and close friend. Independent, witty, and full of iconic dances.

name: Cosmo Kramer
blurb: Jerry's eccentric neighbor. Known for his wild entrances, weird schemes, and big heart.
